short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access RateMyProf ratings directly from McMaster's MyTimetable!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make your course selection process at McMaster University a breeze with McMaster RateMyProf! This extension seamlessly integrates professor info from RateMyProfessors.com into McMaster University's MyTimetable! 

Key Features:

*Instant Color-Coded Professor Ratings*
After logging in to McMaster University's MyTimetable, the extension immediately detects any professor names on the page and color-codes their ratings based on their scores. 

* Informative Tooltips *
Hover over a rating to reveal a detailed tooltip with additional information about the professor, including:  
1. Overall rating 
2. Difficulty level
3. Percentage of students who would take the professor again
4. Total number of ratings
5. Direct link to the professor's RateMyProfessors.com Profile

With this extension, you'll be equipped to choose the professors who align with your learning style and preferences. Make the best course and professor selections with McMaster RateMyProf! Download the extension today! 

Note: This extension is not affiliated with McMaster University or RateMyProfessors.com. It is a third-party tool designed to enhance your course selection experience.
